column4: hmm why apokryphos  & Tooheys why do you tink it's impossible to make comercial applications that run on linux ?
never said it was; it sure isn't (it's been done many-a-time).

it seemed like you meant that getting into development of applications on linux was not profitable. Not all applications build to run on a linux machine need to be free (or open source for that matter)
never said that, and of course you can -- yes
